metadata.title: Waggy - Professional Pet Care Services
metadata.description: Trusted pet sitting, dog walking, and grooming services. Book experienced pet caregivers in your area for your furry friends.

auth.title: Sign In
auth.description: Sign in to Waggy to book pet care services.

booking.title: Book Service
booking.error: Failed to create booking. Please try again.
booking.login_required: Please login to book a service.
booking.no_pets: You don't have any pets yet. Please add a pet first.
booking.select_at_least_one_pet: Please select at least one pet.

charity.pageSubtitle: Join us in making a difference. Every donation counts.

donationDialog.title: Donate to this cause
donationDialog.description: Your contribution helps us reach our goal.

landing.title: Make a Difference Today
landing.subtitle: Help us support animals in need. Your contribution can save a life.

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.addressMissing: You haven't added an address yet. Please go to the addresses page to add one.

phoneVerification.title: Phone Verification
phoneVerification.description: Please verify your phone number to continue.

emailVerification.title: Email Verification
emailVerification.description: Please verify your email address to continue.

search.title: Find a Sitter
search.guest_location_prompt: Set your location to see distances and sort by proximity.

hero.title: Peace of Mind for You. Pure Joy for Them.
hero.subtitle: Join 15,000+ happy pet parents. Trusted local care when you can't be there.
hero.illustrationTitle: Calm care, even when you're away
hero.illustrationBody: A trusted sitter keeps routines, comfort, and love exactly where your pet needs it.

story.title: Leaving them shouldn't mean worrying.
story.body: We know that anxious feeling before you leave home. We built Waggy so your pet gets loving care and you get true peace of mind.

trust.title: Your pet's safety is our promise.
items: Every sitter goes through profile and identity checks before joining.
See honest feedback from pet parents with similar needs.
All payments are protected on-platform with full transparency.
If anything feels off, our support team is ready anytime.

services.title: Services built around comfort and trust
items: A warm and safe home while you're traveling.
Your pet stays calm in their familiar home.
Healthy movement, happy mood, more energy.
Reliable daytime care for busy schedules.

becomeSitter.title: Path to Become a Sitter
becomeSitter.description: To start operating as a sitter, please complete the following steps.

charityVerification.title: Charity Verification
charityVerification.description: To create a charity case, please complete the following verification steps.

status.title: Account Status
status.pendingMessage: Your information is being reviewed by experts. Please be patient.

servicesStep.title: Select Services
servicesStep.description: Choose the services you want to provide.
servicesStep.noServices: No services available at the moment.

servicesPage.title: All Pet Care Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Pick the service that fits your pet's routine, comfort, and personality.

how.title: How it works
items: Explore nearby sitters and read real reviews.
Message the sitter, ask questions, and confirm expectations.
Reserve your preferred service with secure payment.
Receive updates while your pet is cared for with love.

testimonials.title: What pet parents say
items: I was anxious at first, but after chatting with the sitter I felt calm. Daily photo updates helped a lot.
I traveled without worry for the first time. Smooth and respectful experience.
The sitter was very respectful and responsible. I left my pet with peace of mind.

safety.title: Your pet's safety is our priority
points: We follow up if any issue occurs
safety.end: Because your trust means everything to us.

sitter.title: Love pets?
sitter.subtitle: Turn that love into meaningful income.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
items: Can I talk to the sitter before booking?
Yes. You can message and coordinate before confirming.
Our support team follows up and helps resolve it quickly.
Payments are handled securely through the platform.
Yes. Your personal data stays private and protected.
What if I am not satisfied?
We review each case and provide clear support steps.

final.title: Because they trust you. And you can trust us.

auth.title: Welcome back
auth.subtitle: Quick sign-in, warm support, and trusted care for your best friend.

showcase.title: Care starts with trust.
showcase.subtitle: Join a trusted community of pet parents and verified sitters.
showcase.imageAlt: Pet sitter caring for a dog

becomeSitter.title: Become a Sitter
becomeSitter.description: Earn money doing what you love. Join our community.

home.ready: Ready to find the perfect care for your furry friend?

refer.title: Refer a friend
refer.desc: Give $20, get $20 when you refer a friend to Waggy.

fields.name: Name

fields.vetInfoPlaceholder: Add your vet's name, address and phone number
fields.insurancePlaceholder: This helps you track your pet info all in one place but is not required to book on Waggy
fields.photoGallery: Show off your pet by adding photos and curating photos taken during your bookings.

options.morning: Needs to be fed in the morning
options.twice: Needs to be fed twice a day
options.oneHour: Can be left alone for 1 hour or less

options.fourToEightHours: Can be left alone for 4-8 hours
